body.p: To Beriah Magoffin Governor of Ky

Your petitioners would represent that at the term of the Breathitt Circuit Court he was fined the sum of $20_ for gaming He says that at the time the fine was assessed against him he confessed a judgment because his family was sick and he could not attend the trial of said Court. He says he had a valid defence to said charge if he could have attended said Court as he was informed by his council. He says he is a poor man & has a large family. Times are hard & it will destress his family to pay said fine -- He therefore prays that said fine be remitted -- & all such as your honor can extend.
sworn to before me by R Cox this 7th day of June 1861
John C Co C clk O C C
The undersigned asks your honor to remit the fine named in the within petition
